lead_paragraph: Colorado's governor says he supports a proposal to have the state's public employee pension fund oppose a boycott seeking to punish Israel for its treatment of Palestinians.

headline.main: Colorado Governor Calls for Opposing Boycott of Israel
headline.print_headline: Colorado Governor Calls for Opposing Boycott of Israel

snippet: Colorado's governor says he supports a proposal to have the state's public employee pension fund oppose a boycott seeking to punish Israel for its treatment of Palestinians.
